## Description {#details}

Path iterator.

This is an input iterator that iterates over the individual components in <em>path</em>. The traversal order is as follows:
<ul>
<li>The root-name element, if present.</li>
<li>The root-directory element, if present.</li>
<li>Each successive filename element, if present.</li>
<li>Dot, if one or more trailing non-root slash characters are present. Traversing backwards is possible with <em><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/path/reverse-iterator">reverse&#95;iterator</a></em></li>
</ul>


Iteration examples. Each component is separated by &#39;,&#39;: 
<ProgramListing>

<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">/          =&gt; /</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">/foo       =&gt; /,foo</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">foo/       =&gt; foo,.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">/foo/<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/lltok/#af353621f14cb4b4b3af5ffaff84076b1a90341ec0034ef3ce30ba4c96acf92173">bar</a>   =&gt; /,foo,<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/lltok/#af353621f14cb4b4b3af5ffaff84076b1a90341ec0034ef3ce30ba4c96acf92173">bar</a></Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">../        =&gt; ..,.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">C:\\foo\\bar =&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>:,\\,foo,<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/lltok/#af353621f14cb4b4b3af5ffaff84076b1a90341ec0034ef3ce30ba4c96acf92173">bar</a></Highlight></CodeLine>

</ProgramListing>

Definition at line 73 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/path-h">Path.h</a>.
